properties.query:
let q0=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershell\.exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwsh\.exe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShell\.Exe" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwsh\.dll")) and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Add-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "ConvertTo-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Disable-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Enable-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Export-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Get-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Grant-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Install-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Invoke-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Join-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "New-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Open-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Read-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Register-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Remove-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Restore-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Search-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Send-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Set-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Start-AADInt" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "Update-AADInt"))|extend RuleId="5163A000-5160-5160-5160-5163A5163A212"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_aadinternals_cmdlets_execution.yml";
let q1=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where ((TargetProcessCommandLine contains "System\.Management\.Automation\.AmsiUtils" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains "amsiInitFailed") or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "[Ref]\.Assembly\.GetType" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "SetValue($null,$true)" and TargetProcessCommandLine contains "NonPublic,Static"))|extend RuleId="30edb182-aa75-42c0-b0a9-e998bb29067c"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_amsi_init_failed_bypass.yml";
let q2=_Im_ProcessCreate
| where (((TargetProcessName endswith "\\powershell\.exe" or TargetProcessName endswith "\\pwsh\.exe") or (TargetProcessFilename =~ "PowerShell\.EXE" or TargetProcessFilename =~ "pwsh\.dll")) and ((TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -e" and (TargetProcessCommandLine contains " JAB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " SUVYI" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " SQBFAFgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " aQBlAHgA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " aWV4I" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " IAA" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " IAB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " UwB" or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " cwB")) or (TargetProcessCommandLine contains "\.exe -ENCOD " or TargetProcessCommandLine contains " BA^J e-")) and (not(TargetProcessCommandLine contains " -ExecutionPolicy remotesigned ")))|extend RuleId="ca2092a1-c273-4878-9b4b-0d60115bf5ea"|extend SourceURL="https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/blob/master/rules/windows/process_creation/proc_creation_win_powershell_base64_encoded_cmd.yml";
